title: Mark of the Star Guardian Icon
body: I finished the quiz, it said that it already redeem the icon, but on my account didn't have that icon. when can i receive that icon?

replies.body: WHERE IS MY ICON !!! 6 DAY WAIT!!!!

Who did you get?  :D  Make sure you are logged onto your account on the site while taking the quiz.  It will take a few days for the icons to unlock on an account, so hang tight!  Let me know if you have any questions.
Same here, not getting the icon and have been waiting for at least 5 days! :( Everything else is correct, no mistakes here for the accounts. It's just not showing up in the inventory :(
Same I sent in a ticket and it hasnt been responded to. This is the only icon I really wanted and I have been waiting for over 4 days now.
i got lulu in the first quiz
(Got Jinx) Same problem here; I've been waiting for 5-6 days{{item:3070}}
